titleStmt.title: The historie of heauen containing the poeticall fictions of all the starres in the firmament: gathered from amongst all the poets and astronomers. By Chrystopher Middleton.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Christopher, 1560?-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Orwin] for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop at the little north doore of S. Paules,

notesStmt.note: The extra leaf in quire A contains a dedication to Robert Traps, signed: C.K.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
